code: import _classCallCheck from"/Users/alejandromurawczik/Movies/Programacion/ IronHack/Ironhack/week7/day5/BYOG/client/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck";import axios from'axios';var services=function services(){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,services);this.getEvents=function(){return _this.service.get('/');};this.getEvent=function(eventId){return _this.service.get("/".concat(eventId,"/details"));};this.saveEvent=function(theEvent){return _this.service.post("/new-event",theEvent);};this.editEvent=function(theEventEdit){return _this.service.put("/".concat(theEventEdit._id,"/edit"),theEventEdit);};this.deleteEvent=function(eventId){return _this.service.delete("/".concat(eventId,"/delete"));};this.service=axios.create({baseURL:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/events"),withCredentials:true});};export{services as default};
